mapper.select: INSERT INTO PUBLIC.todo_list (id, title) SELECT to_char(current_date, 'YYMMDD') || '-' || lpad((coalesce(max(substring(tl.id, 8, 10)::int), 0) + 1)::text, 3, '0'), #{title} FROM PUBLIC.todo_list as tl WHERE substring(tl.id, 1, 6) = to_char(current_date, 'YYMMDD') RETURNING id
mapper.insert: insert into PUBLIC.todo_list_history(todo_list_id, history_sequence_no, todo_list_title) select tl.id, (select coalesce(max(tlh.history_sequence_no) + 1, 0) from PUBLIC.todo_list_history tlh where tlh.todo_list_id = #{entityId}), tl.title from PUBLIC.todo_list as tl where tl.id = #{entityId}
